name: account_transaction_history
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool binance_smart_chain.
Tool description: All-In-One access to the BSC blockchain data!

More features are coming soon!

Feedback and feature requests should be sent to:
angleitnerchristoph123@gmail.com
API description: Retrieves an array of all transactions associated with a specific address on the Optimism blockchain.

address.description: The blockchain address to query for transaction history.

network.description: The network to query, either 'mainnet' or 'testnet'. Defaults to None.
